hartree-fock-0.1.0.0: An implementation of the Hartree-Fock method

hartree-fock-0.1.0.0: An implementation of the Hartree-Fock method

  • | In this library, functions for implementing the hartree-fock method, a method for approximately solving electronic many-body systems, are provided. As an important tool, Gaussian integral evaluation functions are provided. Based on this, the Roothaan-Hall equation can be solved. NOTE: This library is highly experimentally and errors or bugs might occur. Use with patience. -
